alert.note: Alert for Cerro Gordo (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 31 at 5:48AM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Cerro Gordo County, including Mason City, through 645 AM CDT... At 543 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Mason City. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Heavy rainfall of one to three inches, with locally higher amounts possible. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Ponding of water on roadways, low visibilities, and rises in small streams and creeks. This storm will remain over mainly areas of eastern Cerro Gordo County, including the following locations... Rockwell, Mason City, Rock Falls, and Plymouth. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
